actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules.

official_title: A bill to require institutions of higher education to provide voter registration information and opportunities to students registering for class, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Student Voter Registration Act of 1996 - Amends the National Voter Registration Act of 1993 to require institutions of higher education to provide voter registration information and opportunities to students registering for enrollment in a course of study. Makes such requirement applicable if the institution receives Federal funds and provides a two- or four-year program for which it awards an associate, baccalaureate, or graduate degree. Sets forth a schedule for implementation of such requirement, under which larger institutions must comply earlier than smaller ones.

titles.title: A bill to require institutions of higher education to provide voter registration information and opportunities to students registering for class, and for other purposes.
